name: tm82
effect: Teaches Sleep Talk to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Dragon Tail to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Sleep Talk)

flavor_text.black_white: The user knocks away the target and drags out another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user knocks away the target and drags out another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.
